Producer: Lucas Foster, Alexandra Milchan, Erwin Stoff
Screenwriter: Kurt Wimmer, Jamie Moss, James Ellroy
Synopsis: Tom Ludlow (Keanu Reeves), a veteran member of the LAPD, is still mourning the loss of his wife and trying to navigate through a world that does not make much sense anymore. When evidence implicates him in the death of a fellow officer, Ludlow begins to question the loyalties of everyone around him.
Title: Street Kings
